channel.title: Posts on Dan Wright

item.title: Reading List
item.description: Here’s some books or articles I’d recommend. I can’t claim this list is some sort of cohesive narrative, but I’d say all of these have something of merit regardless of political persuasion. I will add to this. Politics Leviathan, Thomas Hobbes. You get no street cred for putting Hobbes on a list like this because every politics undergrad reads him, but they read him for good reason. The Putney Debates. I got a copy in one of those ridiculous Verso sales.
